title: Energy bills increase up to £96 as price cap rises
lead: The change, from 1st April, is estimated to affect 15 million customers

title: US wind output hits new heights in December
lead: EIA estimates that wind accounted for 9% of US electricity generation in 2020

title: More than a million EVs and hybrids sold in Europe in 2020
lead: Nearly one-in-six passenger cars registered in Europe was electrically-charged

title: RenewableUK appoints Siemens executive as new CEO
lead: Dan McGrail helped the manufacturing giant seal a £310 million deal for the blade factory in Hull

title: EDF Renewables launches first floating PV plant
lead: The 20MW project is forecast to produce the equivalent of the annual electricity consumption of 12,500 households

title: Royal Dutch Shell reports 21 billion dollar loss
lead: The company’s net debt increased by $1.9 billion in the last three months of the year

title: BMW turns to Dubai desert sunshine to produce aluminium
lead: The ‘world’s largest’ solar park will power aluminium production operations

title: Businesses and their supply chains expected to halve emissions between now and 2030
Hot green water for Oxford’s pool
lead: Hinksey outdoor pool is 52m long and 35m wide and one of the biggest in the south of England

title: A salty wee dram – Scotch made by the sea!
lead: A 3MW subsea turbine project will support the production of Scotch whisky distilled by tidal power
